name: SetPlayerWorldBounds
notes: A player's world boundaries can be reset by setting them to 20000.0000, -20000.0000, 20000.0000, -20000.0000. These are the default values.
warnings: This function doesn't work in interiors!
description: Set the world boundaries for a player. Players can not go out of the boundaries (they will be pushed back in).

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to set the world boundaries of.

params_body.name: Float:x_max
params_body.description: The maximum X coordinate the player can go to.

params_body.name: Float:x_min
params_body.description: The minimum X coordinate the player can go to.

params_body.name: Float:y_max
params_body.description: The maximum Y coordinate the player can go to.

params_body.name: Float:y_min
params_body.description: The minimum Y coordinate the player can go to.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
